scripts.start: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.server.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.local.js && cp -r public dist/public && node dist/server.js
scripts.start:development: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.server.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.development.js && cp -r public dist/public && node dist/server.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.server.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.local.js
scripts.build:development: webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.server.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.local.js
scripts.build:production: webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.development.js && cp _redirects dist/ && cp -r public dist/public
